rukus.text: 91|2|sapata candrara yetiya i suryara pichata abirbhara haya
91|4|raatira sapata yetiya i suryaka acchadita karae
91|5|sapata akasara arau se'i sattara yijane iyaka nirmana karaiche
91|6|prthiraira sapata arau yijane iyaka bistrta karaiche
91|7|sapata naphachara arau yijane iyaka subin'yasta karaiche
91|8|tara pichata iyaka tara satkamara arau asatkamara jnana dana karaiche
91|9|nisandehe siye'i saphala haiche yiye nijake paraitra karaiche.
91|10|Arau siye'i byartha haiche, yiye nijake kalusita karaiche.
91|12|Yetiya sihamtara majara hatabhagya byaktijana tatpara hai uthila
91|13|tetiya allahara raachule sihamtaka ka'le, 'allahara utajanika arau ta'ira pani khoraa samparke saradhana horaa'.
91|14|Kintu sihamte asbikara karaile arau utajanika badha karaile. Phalata sihamtara papara babe sihamtara pratipalake sihamtaka samule dhbansa karai ekakara karai dile.
